description: Sexy sassy Roxy DeVille makes her first Hogtied appearance. Roxy is a defiant little Princess, and likes to control the situations she finds herself in, but this Hogtied shoot is a rude awakening for her, as she is dominated and controlled scene after scene. Roxy is a good sport and we give her credit for sticking it though to the end. For a girl who did not warm up to the situation, we still get her body to cum. In the end Roxy was glad it was over, but was also proud she made it though.
title: Roxy DeVille
